description: Join us for the Consensus 2026 Official Opening Night Party at The Trilogy, a multi-experience destination spanning three distinct spaces on the 26th floor, overlooking the Hong Kong skyline. Piranha and Platinum Badge Holders preregistrations are closed, for entry please bring your Piranha or Platinum Badge with you for entry. AGENDA 7:00 PM - 9:00 PM: Reception & Networking Kick off the week with complimentary cocktails and curated networking. Connect with founders, builders, investors, and leaders shaping the future of crypto, Web3, and digital finance. Please bring Consensus badge for priority access. 9:00 PM Late After Party The experience activates across all three venues throughout the night. WHAT S HAPPENING IN EACH SPACE Ella (Speakeasy Lounge) Live performances by Vossa 45-minute sets at 8:30 PM and 9:45 PM Note: Seating is limited inside Ella Rooftop WAV Anil Ahuja & DJ Mia: Immersive rooftop visuals featuring works from 30 renowned global artists Keyz Nightclub 10:00 PM 1:00 AM Special DJ set by Dayah Modo Produced by NOLCHA Special Note: Consensus Piranha or Platinum Badge Holders are granted express entry by showing their badge at entry.
